verses.text: God has made himself known in Judah, his name is great in Israel.
\w His|strong="H3045"\w* tent \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Salem, \w his|strong="H3045"\w* dwelling \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Zion.
\w There|strong="H1961"\w* he broke \w the|strong="H1961"\w* lightning arrows, shield, sword, \w and|strong="H6726"\w* weapons \w of|strong="H1961"\w* war. \qs Selah\qs*
Terrible \w is|strong="H2719"\w* \w your|strong="H7665"\w* splendour \w on|strong="H2719"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* everlasting mountains.
Despoiled \w were|strong="H2042"\w* the stout \w of|strong="H2042"\w* heart; in the sleep into which they had fallen, none \w of|strong="H2042"\w* the warriors could lift \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hand.

\w At|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* rebuke, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Jacob, \w sank|strong="H5123"\w* chariot \w and|strong="H3027"\w* horse \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*.
Awful \w are|strong="H5483"\w* you: who can stand before you, \w when|strong="H3290"\w* once you \w are|strong="H5483"\w* angry?
\w The|strong="H6440"\w* judgment \w you|strong="H6440"\w* gave \w from|strong="H6440"\w* heaven \w frightened|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth into silence,

\w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* arose \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w judgment|strong="H1779"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* save \w the|strong="H8085"\w* oppressed \w of|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* fiercest \w will|strong="H6035"\w* praise \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H6035"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* remnant \w hold|strong="H6965"\w* festival.

Vow \w and|strong="H3034"\w* pay \w to|strong="H2534"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* God, \w and|strong="H3034"\w* let all \w who|strong="H3588"\w* are round \w him|strong="H3588"\w* bring presents.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* lops off \w the|strong="H3605"\w* courage \w of|strong="H3068"\w* princes, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w terror|strong="H4172"\w* fills kings \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.
